subject: RE: [junit] setup method
msgSnippet: If you mean only run one setUp() for your entire test suite and only one tearDown() afterwards, look in the faq doc: junit3.7 doc faq faq.htm Otherwise look in
messageBody:
If you mean only run one setUp() for your entire test suite and only one
tearDown() afterwards, look in the faq doc:

junit3.7\doc\faq\faq.htm

Otherwise look in the cookstour doc:

junit3.7\doc\cookstour\cookstour.htm

phil

> ----------
> From: Dineshram[SMTP:dineshram@...]

> Subject: [junit] setup method
>
> Hi all,
> How do I run setup method only once for all the test methods inside the
> testcase ?
>
> Thanks in advance,
>
>
> - D.
